transcript.title: Pope Benedict XVI
transcript.content:
On behalf of all Australians I congratulate Pope Benedict XVI on assuming the throne of St Peter. He takes on the leadership of the Catholic Church at a very important time of both challenge and opportunity for Christianity around the world.

Following in the footsteps of Pope John Paul II, Pope Benedict XVI is also likely to reach out to people across faiths around the world.

On behalf of the Government and the people of Australia, Janette and I wish Pope Benedict XVI well as he guides the Church in the years ahead.
